ðŸ“– Summary: The NewVideoFormatConverter is a Python-based toolkit for video processing, offering features like video format conversion, AI-powered localization (AdLocalizer), and additional tools for static generation, hook remixing, and montage creation. It allows users to convert videos to different formats, translate and generate voiceovers for videos in multiple languages using AI, and provides a modular file structure for better organization and maintainability.
